DOC.HEADLINE: METROPOLITAN DIGEST / LOS ANGELES COUNTY NEWS IN BRIEF : LOS ANGELES COUNTY ; SALVATION_ARMY OFFERING FREE GUIDE TO QUAKE HELP
DOC.TEXT: A guide_on how to get disaster relief is available free_of charge to quake victims and low-income individuals at Salvation_Army sites throughout the county . The 56-page guide is titled " How to Get Food , Disaster Assistance and Money. " It is being released by the Southern California Interfaith Hunger Coalition in partnership with United Way of Greater Los Angeles , Comic Relief , Los Angeles County Department of Community and Senior_Citizens Services , and the Federal Emergency Management Agency ' s Los Angeles Emergency Food and Shelter Program Local Board . The guide is available in English and Spanish and provides information on how to get food , housing , health_care , legal services and other benefits . It also provides details on assistance that is available to individuals with low incomes who need help throughout the year after disasters of a personal nature . " Many people do not know where to turn or what help is available , " said Elizabeth Riley , executive_director of the Interfaith Hunger Coalition .
